title: The Day of the Lord and God's Blessing
summary: Summary for Joel 3. This chapter emphasizes both God's judgment through natural disasters and His mercy when people return to Him.

faq.question: What is the focus of Joel 3?
faq.answer: It focuses on the Day of the Lord, repentance, and the promise of restoration.

faq.question: What hope does Joel 3 offer?
faq.answer: That God will restore what was lost and pour out His Spirit on all people.
